name: BeliefPill
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: BECOME THE BEST VERSION OF YOU! To experience a different life, you have to become a different person. The BELIEF PILL is here to give you a daily dose of the motivation, knowledge, technique, AND challenges you'll need to do just that!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
